Bible
Jansenists
metadata.title: Probleme ecclesiastique proposé à Mr. l'Abbé Boisleau de l'Archeueché. a qui l'on doit croire de Messire Louis Antoine de Noäilles Eueque de Chalons en 1694 ou de Messire Louis-Antoine de Noailles Archeueque de Paris en 1696
metadata.creator: Catholic Church. Archdiocese of Paris (France). Archbishop (1695-1729 : Noailles)
Quesnel, Pasquier, 1634-1719
metadata.call_number: Case Wing folio Z144 .A1 v.2 no. 81
metadata.description: Relating to: (1) Exposition de la foi catholique, by Martin de Barcos; (2) the French translation of the New Testament, with commentary, by Pasquier Quesnel; (3) the "cinq propositions" of the Jansenist controversy
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Damaged, torn, stained and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Irregular pagination. Title page and cover are combined.
